about_the_game:
Mark's Power is an RPG with dialogues, crafting, gathering and turn-based battles. Explore the world where fate has thrown you, and tilt the cup of fate in your favor. Win over the locals, fight the enemies, and do not forget about the main goal — to repair your ship and go home! Or maybe it's worth using your power and...

Technology transfer

One of the key features of this game is the ability to transfer technology, accelerating the natural development of local residents. For example, by teaching the art of making steel things, we will be able to hire stronger warriors armed with sharp swords. On the other hand, the sooner the locals create their first atomic bomb, the worse it will be for us, right?

History

Find out the history of the world where fate has thrown you. Why are the island and lowland states fighting among themselves? What do the remains of giant mechanisms mean?

Trading

There is no money in this wild world, and only the objects themselves have value. Find out the trader's weakness in order to make a profitable exchange. Tip the scales in your favor!

Crafting

You can use your portable manufacturer to create various things. Usually, the created thing is more valuable than the ingredients, so you can make good money on it.

Collecting

You can collect wild pumpkins and other resources, and then use them for trading or crafting.

Researches

You can explore the corners of locations, solve riddles and receive a significant reward for your curiosity.

Battles

To win the battles, you can hire several warriors from the locals. Their strength depends on the thickness of your wallet

The game is easy to control and does not require a long understanding of the mechanics.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1 Gigahertz(GHz) or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia 320M or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Mark's Power: Adventures with crafting, dialogues and riddles. Explore the planet, involve the locals in repairing your spaceship. Find out the secret of this world and decide its fate!
supported_languages: Russian, English, French, German, Simplified Chinese
